verses.verse: In the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the king, <WH4428> in the sixth <WH8345> month, <WH2320> in the first <WH259> day <WH3117> of the month, <WH2320> came <WH1961> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> by <WH3027> Haggai <WH2292> the prophet <WH5030> unto <WH413> Zerubbabel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel, <WH7597> governor <WH6346> of Judah, <WH3063> and to <WH413> Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech, <WH3087> the high <WH1419> priest, <WH3548> saying, <WH559>

Thus <WH3541> speaketh <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> saying, <WH559> This <WH2088> people <WH5971> say, <WH559> The time <WH6256> is not <WH3808> come, <WH935> the time <WH6256> that the LORD's <WH3068> house <WH1004> should be built. <WH1129>
Then came <WH1961> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> by <WH3027> Haggai <WH2292> the prophet, <WH5030> saying, <WH559>
Is it time <WH6256> for you, O ye, <WH859> to dwell <WH3427> in your ceiled <WH5603> houses, <WH1004> and this <WH2088> house <WH1004> lie waste? <WH2720>
Now <WH6258> therefore thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> Consider <WH7760> <WH3824> <WH5921> your ways. <WH1870>

Ye have sown <WH2232> much, <WH7235> and bring in <WH935> little; <WH4592> ye eat, <WH398> but ye have not enough; <WH369> <WH7646> ye drink, <WH8354> but ye are not filled with drink; <WH369> <WH7937> ye clothe <WH3847> you, but there is none warm; <WH369> <WH2552> and he that earneth wages <WH7936> earneth wages <WH7936> to put it into <WH413> a bag <WH6872> with holes. <WH5344>
Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts; <WH6635> Consider <WH7760> <WH3824> <WH5921> your ways. <WH1870>

Go up <WH5927> to the mountain, <WH2022> and bring <WH935> wood, <WH6086> and build <WH1129> the house; <WH1004> and I will take pleasure <WH7521> in it, and I will be glorified, <WH3513> saith <WH559> the LORD. <WH3068>

Ye looked <WH6437> for <WH413> much, <WH7235> and, lo, <WH2009> it came to little; <WH4592> and when ye brought <WH935> it home, <WH1004> I did blow <WH5301> upon it. Why? <WH3282> <WH4100> saith <WH5002> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635> Because <WH3282> of mine house <WH1004> that <WH834> is waste, <WH2720> and ye <WH859> run <WH7323> every man <WH376> unto his own house. <WH1004>
Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the heaven <WH8064> over <WH5921> you is stayed <WH3607> from dew, <WH4480> <WH2919> and the earth <WH776> is stayed <WH3607> from her fruit. <WH2981>

And I called <WH7121> for a drought <WH2721> upon <WH5921> the land, <WH776> and upon <WH5921> the mountains, <WH2022> and upon <WH5921> the corn, <WH1715> and upon <WH5921> the new wine, <WH8492> and upon <WH5921> the oil, <WH3323> and upon <WH5921> that which <WH834> the ground <WH127> bringeth forth, <WH3318> and upon <WH5921> men, <WH120> and upon <WH5921> cattle, <WH929> and upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> the labor <WH3018> of the hands. <WH3709>

Then Zerubbabel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel, <WH7597> and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech, <WH3087> the high <WH1419> priest, <WH3548> with all <WH3605> the remnant <WH7611> of the people, <WH5971> obeyed <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> their God, <WH430> and the words <WH1697> of Haggai <WH2292> the prophet, <WH5030> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> their God <WH430> had sent <WH7971> him, and the people <WH5971> did fear <WH3372> before <WH4480> <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

Then spoke <WH559> Haggai <WH2292> the LORD's <WH3068> messenger <WH4397> in the LORD's <WH3068> message <WH4400> unto the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> I <WH589> am with <WH854> you, saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

And the LORD <WH3068> stirred up <WH5782> <WH853> the spirit <WH7307> of Zerubbabel <WH2216> the son <WH1121> of Shealtiel, <WH7597> governor <WH6346> of Judah, <WH3063> and the spirit <WH7307> of Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech, <WH3087> the high <WH1419> priest, <WH3548> and the spirit <WH7307> of all <WH3605> the remnant <WH7611> of the people; <WH5971> and they came <WH935> and did <WH6213> work <WH4399> in the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> their God, <WH430>
In the four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the sixth <WH8345> month, <WH2320> in the second <WH8147> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the king. <WH4428>
